summary: The firefighter student Francesco Perricone and his cousin the brigadier Barrese fall in love both of the beautiful brunette Caramella and the barracks of Rome are transferred to the village of Sicily where the girl lives.
cast: Franco Franchi|Ciccio Ingrassia|Monica Pardo|Poldo Bendandi|Lisa Halvorsen|Dante Cleri|Rosita Pisano|Alberto Sorrentino|Dante Maggio|Adriano Micantoni|Luca Sportelli|Vittoria Tessitore|Ignazio Balsamo|Gianni Pulone|Mirella Pamphili|Nino Terzo|Enzo Andronico|Lino Banfi|Alfredo Adami|Ignazio Leone|Mario Del Vago
title: I 2 pompieri
